known_issues: User reports an unspecified error in the deployed consultation flow and requests recheck and fix.

existing_features.title: Identify the current error in the deployed consultation flow and fix it so the Consultation page renders and the contact actions work without runtime errors or TypeScript build errors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a minimal regression check for the consultation flow to prevent the same error from reappearing (covering link generation and form-validity gating).

projectName: Recheck and fix the consultation flow error
